quoteText: If you are going to be contacted by us for marketing purposes, we will not rely solely on this notice, but will always seek an additional confirmation from you that it’s OK to do that.
title: This service may use your personal information for marketing purposes

tosdr.case: This service may use your personal information for marketing purposes
tosdr.tldr: "If you are going to be contacted by us for marketing purposes, we will not rely solely on this notice, but will always seek an additional confirmation from you that it’s ok to do that."
